heading: 3. (1) This article applies to a person who is, or becomes, entitled to a
text_raw:
3. (1) This article applies to a person who is, or becomes, entitled to a 
payment specified in article 4 of these Regulations in respect of the relevant 
date or the relevant week, as the case may be. 

(2) Where sub-article (1) of this article applies, the amount payable in 
respect of the relevant date or the relevant week, as the case may be, shall be 
increased by €400. 

(3) A person shall not be entitled to an increase in accordance with subarticle (2) of this article in respect of more than one payment specified in 
article 4 of these Regulations.

EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations provide for the payment of a bonus to recipients of 
disability allowance, blind pension, invalidity pension, and carer’s support 
grant in November 2023. 

The amount of the bonus is €400 in addition to the normal payment that is due 
to the recipient.
